short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically track and record every YouTube video you watch, including ai summary, transcript and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "YouTube Transcript Summary with Gemini" extension automatically tracks and records details of every YouTube video the user watches, including title, description, channel name, transcript, and an AI-generated summary using Google Gemini. It securely stores this data with a PIN code, allowing users to search and manage their viewing history efficiently.

Have you ever found yourself in this frustrating situation? 😫
You remember a crucial piece of information from a YouTube video you watched, but can't recall which video it was from. You spend hours searching through your watch history, trying to find that elusive snippet of knowledge. 🕵️‍♂️

Sound familiar? We've got the solution. ✅

Introducing the YouTube Transcript Summary with Gemini extension:
• 📌 Automatically save your entire YouTube viewing history
• ✍️ Automatically capture YouTube full transcript
• 🔍 Powerful search function to find specific content within videos
• 🔒 Secure your personal viewing data with a PIN code
• 📚 Backup your sessions by exporting them as JSON or CSV files. Import session data easily when needed.
• 🚀 Generate AI-powered summaries of video transcripts. Get concise and structured summaries with a click.

Never lose track of important information again. Whether it's for work, study, or personal interest, our extension ensures that every insight you gain from YouTube is at your fingertips. 📚

Your viewing history is your personal knowledge base. We help you build it, search it, and keep it private. 🛡️

Don't let valuable information slip away. Install our extension today and turn your YouTube watching into an organized, searchable, and secure resource. 🚀
